effects.display_string: Set: While you have one or more Bone Shield charges, the damage you take is reduced by 2.0%. Losing a Bone Shield charge has a chance to reduce the damage you take by an additional 1.0%, up to 3.0% for 6 sec.
(4) Set: Your damage is increased by 0.5% per active Bone Shield charge. Taking damage while below 6 Bone Shield charges has a chance to generate 1-2 Bone Shield charges.
Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain uck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.

(4) Set: uck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While uck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.
Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain uck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.

(4) Set: uck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While uck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,232 Parry and 3,009 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 68,078 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.1 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 2,935 Haste for 12 sec.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 74,592 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
